title: Bukhara
text: Bukhara is seen in the black and white photograph as the upholstery on the chaise longue near the windows.
description: Vert. striped print  that resembles ikat Vert. Printed striped pattern resembles ikat weave.  Stylized corn stalks of navy & tomato on pastel rose.  Handwoven & hand printed. Grenadine
